name.description: Name can be used in the column definition section called functional-dependency.

key_columns.description: Key-columns is a list of numbers of columns from the source file that will be treated as keys.

data_columns.description: Data-columns are the numbers of columns from the source file that will be treated as values.

file.description: File is the path to the source file.

separator.description: Separator is the symbol used as a separator while parsing separated values from the file.
